Join our team

Tier 1 PV Modules, Inverters and Equipment supply

Iris Supply is one of the largest electrical product wholesale distributors in the country. We ship our own inventory every morning to 100+ locations nationally. With a fleet of trucks, we're there when you need us, providing local support at national scale.

Ready to go solar?

About us

Solar Projects Nationwide:
Your Trusted Procurement Partner

We partner with installers and EPC’s nationwide to provide procurement, logistics and warehouse/storage services from Tier 1 equipment vendors for any solar project; residential, C&I and community solar at the best prices.

Whether it is a small system or a few megawatts project, our team has the experience and capacity to handle negotiation, securing and supplying the right equipment at the right price on your behalf.

Reach out to us today for more info on our inventory, services and prices.

Our services

What services do we offer?

Procurement

At Iris Supply, our dedicated procurement team works closely with customers to meticulously source equipment, ensuring the best value for their investment.

Through rigorous negotiations and supplier vetting, we secure the right equipment at the right price, guaranteeing customer satisfaction and project success.

Logistics

Every project has its own needs and delivery schedule and we are here to help smooth this process.

Our experienced team ensures seamless equipment pickup and delivery services, tailored to meet the unique needs and timelines of each project. From coordinating transportation to managing schedules, we handle every detail to ensure efficient operations and on-time delivery.

Warehouse / Storage

We assist our customers locate the best warehouses closest to their projects nationwide. Leveraging our extensive network, we assist customers in locating the best warehouses nationwide.

With secure facilities and efficient inventory management, we provide peace of mind, knowing equipment is stored safely until needed.
